content.value:
Before I install the Govt tracking app, they must publish:
- source code
- data and hosting details
- security policy
- reporting tools

and allow Parliamentary and independent auditors ongoing oversight of data usage

Sorry to be difficult but Johnson govt is not to be trusted
content.html: Before I install the Govt tracking app, they must publish: - source code - data and hosting details - security policy - reporting tools and allow Parliamentary and independent auditors ongoing oversight of data usage Sorry to be difficult but Johnson govt is not to be trusted
